website_summaries.verdict: This adorable diaper bag backpack effortlessly converts from a traditional cross-body messenger or an over-the-shoulder tote, to a comfortable backpack diaper bag.
pros: With 10 secure pockets, a changing pad, and stroller straps, this bag is ultra chic and convenient
Comes in black strips or navy stripes
Can wear as a messenger bag, a tote, or a backpack
cons: Some have said it's not as big as they would like

customer_reviews.title: Great value for a cute, big diaper bag.
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! Size is great, plenty of pockets, comes with a shoulder strap and backpack straps and stroller straps! So far it's been great and I love it. Has little pegs to stand on so it doesn't sit directly on the ground which is a bonus for me. The only reason I give it 4 stars not 5 is that the materials is not as high-quality looking as I had hoped, it's more of a screen print stripe instead of alternating fabric, if that makes sense. But I still love it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah T.

customer_reviews.title: Not just a Diaper Bag
customer_reviews.text: So I’m using this as a tech bag I’m a student and I carry multiple devices. iPhones and iPad Pro multiple stylus pens and pencils notepads even a bamboo slate folio so I need a bag that’s not only adorable but durable. It can be carry multiple ways most importantly waterproof. The best thing about using a diaper bag for tech bag diaper bags come with a changing pad which can be folded double to add more protection to your device. Above is an picture of all the things I could fit in this bag with ease
customer_reviews.author: One Chic Geek Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I had a separate diaper bag for everyday use (big one) and a separate smaller backpack for travel and it was so annoying to change from one to another every now and then. The best feature in this one is that it becomes a messenger, a backpack and has straps to hang it on a stroller separately! And it is wide, so not one of those deep long backpacks where things get lost! The size is big yet not so big that it can’t be carried as a backpack. So a decent size! The material is good and easy to clean, enough pockets and I just love the retro stripes! So happy with this buy!
customer_reviews.author: ariba

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic bag & AMAZING customer service
customer_reviews.text: I got this bag as a dupe for the ridiculously expensive jujube BFF. It has enough room for everything baby needs plus my items! You have several wear options which is great BUT Hip Cubs customer service is what blew me away. I lost my shoulder strap & emailed hoping I could buy a replacement which I could not ☹️ as they don't sell them BUT THEY SENT ME THE STRAP FOR FREE even though I purchased their bag on Amazon. I was floored, I will forever be a hip Cub fan!!
customer_reviews.author: SANTIAGO FAMILY

customer_reviews.title: BIG BAG FOR MOMMA THAT PACKS A LITTLE OF EVERYTHING
customer_reviews.text: If you're that mom like me that loves to pack almost about EVERYTHING because JUST IN CASE then this is for you. A little bulky when placed under the stroller but other than that it is perfect. So many things you can fit in here. I had 2 full sets of clothes, 2 muslin blankets, a 24 oz thermo, 6 dippers, a small thin case of wipes, 2 of 5 oz bottles, 3 pasafiers, lots of pads and breast pads, small bags for dirty clothes, a warm thick blanket, my wallet phone keys and STILL had lots of room for more. Lol I want to say without the thick blanket you'd have 1/4 of room left in there.
customer_reviews.author: Mixie Q

customer_reviews.title: Stylish but not durable
customer_reviews.text: Originally I was in love with this bag. It was stylish, roomy, versatile and just all around convenient and usable. However, had it for about 2 weeks and one of the metal clasps that make it backpack usable, went out...and by out I mean. Out. It won't clip. It's unusable now as a backpack which is the exact reason I purchased it. In my world anything that is designed for use in a parent role...has to be durable and not just about looks. So...still love the look but disappointed in the quality 😐
customer_reviews.author: contradictions

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bag
customer_reviews.text: The perfect bag! I bought because it has the backpack option & shoulder strap. It’s rare to find a decent looking & priced bag with both. You can really fill it with a lot of stuff. Easy to organize multiple babies & mommy’s stuff with all the pockets. Stays on shoulder or back nicely. Includes stroller straps too which aren’t included or extra with many bags. Easy to wipe down fabric. My last oh joy bag only lasted 6 months before falling apart. Hopefully this one holds up because It’s my favorite bag I’ve purchased.
customer_reviews.author: JVR

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag!
customer_reviews.text: It's so easy to use and I get compliments on it all the time. It's a little pricey but as a gift was great. It has tons of spaces for everything I need and two spots for water bottles or baby bottles. The changing pad fits in the back pocket nicely. The front pockets are great for keys and cell phone and tissues and other small things I always need to get with easy access while in a hurry.
customer_reviews.author: Liz S

customer_reviews.title: Already has a hole, great bag otherwise.
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. It’s big enough for 2 kids. Nice big pockets on the sides for a toddler drink and a baby bottle. Except we’ve had this bag for 2 months and with VERY light use and it already has a hole in the exterior from pulling free from the stitching. This bag wasn’t cheap. Nor does it look or feel cheap. So I’m pretty disappointed. Not sure how long the bag will last.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: So glad I decided to get it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag so much, got it when I found out I was pregnant with my second and have been exclusively using it since then! It has so much space and keeps me slightly organized, I love that it is waterproof, i love the way it looks, and it has survived my 3 year old for over a year now with no real damage.
customer_reviews.author: Lishalovesyou

customer_reviews.title: Best Diaper Bag I've Owned!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is so versatile, I baby wear and the crossbody option is perfect for that then any other time I wear it as a backpack! I will never get a different one after this! 5 different bags in a year and a half and this one is so well made, I doubt ill need to replace it! Defintaly the best buy for diaper bags! The only con is that I always get it a bit dirty with the white stripes.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Lemonds

customer_reviews.title: Cute & Carrys alot!
customer_reviews.text: I like the versatility of this bag and have used it as both a over the shoulder and backpack. I have 2 kids ages 1 and 5 and it fits all the diapers, clothes, snacks, toys, first aid, wallet, phone, tablet everything that i carry and things are still easily accessible. Its also easy to clean i just wipe it off with a baby wipe most times
customer_reviews.author: Kerri

customer_reviews.title: Hip cub diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: I just got my diaper bag in the mail on Friday so I’m not sure on the durability or easy to clean but I’m in love with it. I don’t have to go digging for anything I need for my daughter and I don’t have to worry about it being lost. The versatility of it going from a backpack to a shoulder strap is amazing. I also like the colors so my husband isn’t afraid to pack it. 😂 I’m excited to take it on vacation to see how it holds up, so I’ll update later on that part. 😀
customer_reviews.author: Daddyx3

customer_reviews.title: Big inside
customer_reviews.text: It looks small online but it’s so big and spacious inside and has so many pockets for everything you could possibly need. Unfortunately I received it with one broken zipper from the front pocket. That was my original review^ but the company messaged me same day and were able to send me a replacement for mine. Such amazing service from beginning to end. Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Obsessed with this diaper bag! We had one of the large skip and hop diaper bags and we were looking for a book bag type to have as well. After lots of reading of reviews I kept landing right back here And decided to order it! I love it! The compartments make it easy to find things compares to my other diaper bag! Huge bonus that it’s so stylish!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was pleasantly surprised when I opened my package and saw the diaper bag! Being that this is so cheap compared to pretty bunch any bag you could find at babies r us I had my concerns but the bag is very cute and the materials feel like they will hold up for a while! The bag is not oversized and can fit just enough! I am overall very pleased with this purchase and would recommend buy it if you are undecided!
customer_reviews.author: Shelby K

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this bag for about 6 months now & it still looks brand new! It’s been through the ringer but the quality of the material has kept it still looking amazing! I also love the material because it allows for easy cleaning when a bottle spills inside (ugh). ALSO this looks exactly like a jujube! Perfect if you like the designer bag but can’t justifying spending $200 on a diaper bag🙃
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: So glad I purchased it
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always been a shoulder bag gal, but with a newborn and a toddler, I realized the importance of having two free hands. This bag has been my life savior! It’s big enough but small enough to carry everything! So glad I purchased it. I’ve been recommending Hip Cub to everyone now.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Material of black and white is very thin and cheap looking.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this in the hopes of having a cute diaper bag that could convert to a backpack, instead of just having a backpack. I did not care for the material at all. I could see the black stripes through the white stripes of the material. It was a thin, and felt very cheaply made. I love the concept and the size was great. If it had better material I probably would have kept it.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Grace

customer_reviews.title: It really cute.
customer_reviews.text: I was going to return this bag because I got it for a trip and it just wasnt big enough. When we got back I decided I really like it and I started using it. The bag is great! I like the material and the design and its easy to clean. My only complaint is that the shoulder pad is coming apart. This kinda scares me that the bag is going to do the same, hopefully not.
customer_reviews.author: Brandie Blackston

customer_reviews.title: Super Stylish
customer_reviews.text: I love my diaper bag! I bought this because my other diaper bag was small. I'm a first time mom and I always tend to over-pack. It is stylish, cute, and bigger than other diaper bags I've seen. I like the option to use as an over the shoulder bag or a backpack. However, I wish the stroller straps were permanently attached to the bag. It's such a pain to put them on the stroller. But it's stylish and great. I'd recommend this because I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsi Galway

customer_reviews.title: Cute but pricy
customer_reviews.text: This diaper bag is super cute! I got multiple complements on it every where I went. But, after a few months the bag started to rip. Also the strap did not have any sort of grip so the bag sometimes would slide off my shoulder. If the bad lasted me longer than a few months I would’ve gave it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: mari

customer_reviews.title: Good product quality
customer_reviews.text: This diaper bag is the best very chic and not cringy to look at it's very functional lasted me a whole year before I decide I wanted to update and get a new one I definitely recommend getting, it does well with washing and comes out good as new
customer_reviews.author: Jenn R.

customer_reviews.title: Best diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bag. I was super picky in choosing a diaper bag and this is exactly what I was looking for. Cute enough to “replace” my purse, not too large but holds everything, lots of pockets, easy to clean, cross body strap and backpack straps, etc. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: kh21

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Adorable and works perfectly for my family. I can use the front pockets more my belongings and put my toddlers and 9 month old stuff in the back. I also really like the changing pad can be stored on the outside pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Massingill

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was expecting-update excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: Contacted customer service and they replied immediately, were very apologetic and offered to replace my bag, with an appropriate logo. Excellent customer service and looking forward to replacement bag! Bag arrived on time. Cute patten. However, the logo is stitched upside down, which leaves bag looking cheaper than it cost. Also, fabric is cheaper and thinner than described. Slightly smaller than expected and disappointed overall.
customer_reviews.author: Edav89

customer_reviews.title: The only pro to that is it would be easy to wipe away spills
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed, I’ll stick to my JuJuBe. The fabric unlike the smaller canvas bag is a cheap material that is stitched together poorly and is slightly transparent/see through making the colors blend together up close making it look even cheaper. The only pro to that is it would be easy to wipe away spills. I couldn’t see this bag lasting long so I returned.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Dickinson

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this diaper bag for a year now and I can honestly say I love it! Super cute and everything I needed for a new baby!
customer_reviews.author: Car

customer_reviews.title: It's great!
customer_reviews.text: I get many compliments on this bag. It's a great neutral as I have a infant and toddler (boy/girl). Adequate space...I use one of the zipper areas for my personals, so we all have our own space with this bag.
customer_reviews.author: thirstcurls

customer_reviews.title: Stands up by itself!
customer_reviews.text: The most important thing for me in a diaper bag is it being convertible between a messenger and backpack style. This diaper bag not only accomplishes that but also has so much space inside. I love the width of the large space and the little pockets within. I also love the 2 pockets on the front. My favorite part I wasn't expecting was the metal claws the bag sits on so it's not directly on the floor and doesn't fall over easily. It's a great diaper bag so far!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy A.

customer_reviews.title: Stop Looking This is the Diaper Bag For U..
customer_reviews.text: This is by for one of the best diaper bags I have used. I have had three before this one. My child is 2 now. And since I hope this one I have loved it since. I have had it for about a year now.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Martinez

customer_reviews.title: In love with this bag!
customer_reviews.text: First of all let me say Amazon prime is amazing, ordered this Saturday night & it came Sunday morning. I am so happy with this bag! Seems very durable and easy to clean. It is super chic in cannot wait to use it for my diaper bag. Definitely makes me feel like a trendy mom. So happy I got this instead of this $100 bag I was going to get! It's is super roomy and comes with a matching changing pad. I love that you can use it as a backpack, tote or on the stroller. Great buy so far.
customer_reviews.author: Lo

customer_reviews.title: Handle is not good
customer_reviews.text: its hard to carry because the handle is too smooth to keep it on your shoulder plus the opening from the front is too big and things start falling down. not recommended
customer_reviews.author: Khalil

customer_reviews.title: Kind of disappointed when I received my bag
customer_reviews.text: Kind of disappointed when I received my bag. Ordered black and white but it looks brownish and white and it’s a little smaller than what I expected
customer_reviews.author: Roxy A

customer_reviews.title: My black and white bag looks muted and dirty! I really wanted like this bag as the ...
customer_reviews.text: My black and white bag looks muted and dirty! I really wanted like this bag as the photos looked so nice. I am hoping the seller actually reads this and we can rectify this and hopefully it was just my bag was defective. I will update .
customer_reviews.author: Stefani

customer_reviews.title: Cute but poor quality
customer_reviews.text: This was my favorite baby bag but it hasn’t held up well. It has a cute design, love that it can be used as a backpack or messenger bag, lots of pockets! But within two months of use the handle ripped and on month five the latch for the back pack strap broke. I’m so sad to be tossing this bag out so soon.
customer_reviews.author: Lzimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Holds it all!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this bag!! I was using that other "popular backpack style" diaper bag. You know the one. I hated it! I ordered the hip cub on black Friday and have been using it ever since!!! It holds everything and has a bunch of pockets. It's great and practical for a mom on the go. I throw it on, cam toss my keys in an outside pocket and grab the kids. Buy it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Christi Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Not worth price
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is not what I expected at all, feels very cheap. Not as large or practical as other bags. Not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Chance Glover

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting
customer_reviews.text: After a few tries, and a couple of diaper bag, my daughter fell in love with this bag and is using it before the baby is due because of its versatility! She loves the way it can be a backpack as well as a handbag!
customer_reviews.author: AussieMum

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: Used bag for about 3 weeks before the strap broke. Very disappointed as the bag was functional and efficient! Plus very stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Gisela Bonilla

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 3 months
customer_reviews.text: I have had this bag for about 3 months and it’s already starting to tear where one of the zippers is sewn in. I am not rough on the bag at all and feel like it should last longer then 3 months. Frustrating!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay K Felty

customer_reviews.title: I like it alot
customer_reviews.text: Easy to get to things in it and it also offers a ton of space.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and great quality
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean was a must and this bag is just that. Also very stylish for me. Great quality and lots of room for my two year old and newborn needs!
customer_reviews.author: Darion Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: Not great quality but its its ok for the price.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Functional backpack and purse
customer_reviews.text: I like this purse/backpack. My only complaint is after a month of use. The strap is beginning to fray. But I love all the compartments.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen B Kaiser (itsakrazylife)

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a gift for my sister-in-law’s baby shower.
customer_reviews.author: mvang_00

customer_reviews.title: Really like this bag
customer_reviews.text: Really like this bag. Not too heavy even though I have it packed for my 2 children. Soon to be newborn & 3 yr old. Stylish!
customer_reviews.author: Lynae

customer_reviews.title: Great bag. Great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: It’s an adorable bag with TONS of storage room.... I had a problem with one of the seams starting to rip & their customer service was GREAT to work with. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Mustin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this bag! It's like the JUJUBE! Great quality, great storage! Very stylish!
customer_reviews.author: Carlota Vigoya

customer_reviews.title: Black and white color looks “off”
customer_reviews.text: I also am experience a black and white “color issue” I also do not care for the outside fabric of this bag. The size shape and pockets are all perfect but I can’t get over the fabric. It looks cheap and I am returning.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah H.

customer_reviews.title: Comes with a diaper changing pad
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, and glad it can be a backpack and a bag.
customer_reviews.author: Leavitt

customer_reviews.title: Not as nice as Jujubee BFF
customer_reviews.text: Nice enough but the quailty is definitely not as nice as the jujube. The strap padding is thin. It is very similar to the jujubee bff. If you are looking for a cheaper version of the jujubee this would be a good bag however it will probably have to be replaced after a few months of use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Faulty hook
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is great for the size, style, and versatility but not durability. One of the hooks on the backpack strap keeps opening up. I've only used it for 3 months! The material is not porous but it will show scuff marks on the white stripes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: As is in pic and description! Very happy with my purchase! Great size for 2 kids maybe even another!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Britney

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag! I have the JuJuBe BFF, but needed just a little more space. This is it! I love the versatility of the messenger strap or the backpack option. I use this to transport my pump, parts, and cooler to and from work and it’s perfect. I’m considering a second to use for my daily diaper bag!
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful bag with great price tag.
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this bag for three days but so far I love it!!!! It fits everything I need and it’s easy to find what I need inside the bag. My old Eddie Bauer diaper bag everything would fall to the bottom and I could never find what I needed. I would highly recommend this bag!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Mommy Bag Ever
customer_reviews.text: I carry this as my purse and whatever i need to put in for them fits. Its Light and durable, high quality and best of all versatile. I will buy this product again and again
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Much Space
customer_reviews.text: I use this for a diaper bag. I have received so many compliments on this bag. A very good buy with so much space.
customer_reviews.author: Dominique H.

customer_reviews.title: Diaper bag pack pack
customer_reviews.text: Love that its can be over the shoulder or used as a backpack
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really like how it converts from a backpack to a messenger
customer_reviews.text: I was excited when I found this diaper bag on amazon because I wanted to order the jujube but couldn’t justify paying almost $200 for a diaper bag. I have used this diaper bag for 2 months now. I really like how it converts from a backpack to a messenger. It is a perfect size to carry all of my needs for my newborn.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Baylie

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I’m in love with my diaper bag.. is just perfect.. easy to clean.. lots of space
customer_reviews.author: RosaC

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great bag, stylish and big enough to fit everything I need for 2 yo and a 2 mo !
customer_reviews.author: Arezoo

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag for price
customer_reviews.text: Good storage, looks great. My only complaint is the straps are slippery so it slides off my shoulders.
customer_reviews.author: njwright

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! It wipes clean, super handy with multiple children and it’s very cute. It looks just like the name brand bags without the price tag.
customer_reviews.author: Rene M Burgess

customer_reviews.title: The bag is very roomy
customer_reviews.text: The bag is very roomy. However, I hoped some of the pockets inside had the elastic to prevent things from falling out. Other than that, the bag is stylish and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Monica R.

customer_reviews.title: The perfect diaper bag!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this diaper bag!!! So light weight, versatile, and easy to clean!! 5 stars for sure!!
customer_reviews.author: Ciera Evans

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with it!
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that it can be carried multiple ways - shoulder strap, backpack or handle. The material can be wiped down easily and it seems to be made well so far.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Lyden

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely recommend this to anybody looking for a diaper bag. High quality and many pockets for easy storage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I like this diaper bag a lot. The size is great, not to big not to small. The only thing i dont like is that i ordered my bag black and it came navy blue. Other than that everything is good.
customer_reviews.author: Yesenia

customer_reviews.title: Great diaper bag!
customer_reviews.text: Best diaper bag! Makes it easy or organize and it fits my big hydro flask and another water bottle! This is my 5th diaper bag and I will never go to anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Maranda T

customer_reviews.title: Awesome diaper bag!
customer_reviews.text: Love this diaper bag! Plenty of room for everything and super comfortable on my back. It looks stylish and is perfect for me and my toddler’s needs!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for two under two!
customer_reviews.text: Great bag! I have two babes 16 months apart and this bag is perfect. Tons of room and pockets. The material is wipes and the bottom has feet, so it won’t get dirty easily. I also like how lightweight it is.
customer_reviews.author: Trista

customer_reviews.title: Great diaper bag!
customer_reviews.text: Great stylish look, lots of space, love the backpack straps and crossbody strap.
customer_reviews.author: Edith

customer_reviews.title: Best diaper bag I’ve got so far
customer_reviews.text: I loved it, still haven’t used it but it big enough to store baby needs and more
customer_reviews.author: Karen f.

customer_reviews.title: Good for baby not for older
customer_reviews.text: Not as big as other reviewers suggested. It's a good bag but I wouldn't say it's great. It could be a bit larger which would be better for a toddler. My son's things take up more space than the bag allows. I got some clothes/hat/socks/rag and then some toys in the main part. There is no room for a folded blanket. It's fine for a day out but definitely not a weekend bag like others have suggested.
customer_reviews.author: Erica B

customer_reviews.title: ... black and white striped bag and was a little disappointed in the colors as they appear much different than ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the black and white striped bag and was a little disappointed in the colors as they appear much different than what is pictured. I love the fact that this bag is convertible, but I’m not sure that it will be large enough to tote around what I need for a toddler and a newborn. I am hoping the color issue is just my bag because I would really like to give this bag a better review!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Brown

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the diaper bag itself, but I was given a navy when I ordered black.
customer_reviews.author: Bianca

customer_reviews.title: LOVED it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as a gift. My daughter in law, LOVED it!
customer_reviews.author: Christie Morris-McFadden

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag! I have 2 toddlers and 1 on the way.. it's perfect with plenty of room!!
customer_reviews.author: Simone

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love this bag!
customer_reviews.text: The bag came with a broken zipper and a frayed zipper pull. On top of that the bag is made from very thin fabric and does not fit the 50$ price tag. I love the design and the organization of the pockets. I just wish it had not been damaged. I wouldn’t give this a chance.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Black and white not navy:-(
customer_reviews.text: So I read lots of reviews and thought for sure I read about it being navy and for sure looks navy in other costumer pics. Mine is black and white:-( not a complete deal breaker but was excited it was navy and white stripes because it would match my luggage for up coming trip. As far as holding a lot it does and love that it's a backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super trendy and holds alot.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this diaper bag for my two kiddos. It holds so much and is stylish as well and water resistant. Love the backpack or shoulder options and extra pickets for me in the front.
customer_reviews.author: Megan boris

product_meta.title: Diaper Bag Backpack by Hip Cub - Convertible W/Cute Designer Baby Changing Pad
feature_bullets: GET CONVERTED! Introducing the newest addition to the Hip Cub Family, the stunning new Convertible Diaper Bag Backpack. This truly is the 'diaper bag of choices’ as it effortlessly converts from a traditional cross body messenger or an over the shoulder tote, to a super cute backpack diaper bag!

HANDS OFF… IT'S MINE! let’s face it, being a Mom (or Dad) you are going to need all the hands you can get! This is why more an more mommys are turning to backpack diaper bags, as it enables you to carry all of your baby boy or girl's diapers and other essentials, completely handsfree! (best thing is… this baby bag can be both!)

POCKETS WITH PURPOSE - With 10 x accessible and fucntional pockets (that’s right, 10!) we have developed one of the most functional, stylish and organised nappy changing bags on the market, including; 2 x front durabl zipper secure compartments (one large approx. 10" and one small approx 8"), 5 x spacious interior compartments 1 x back pocket sleeve which perfectly fits a matching changing mat and 2x elasticised side bottle pockets.

INCLUDES STROLLER STRAPS AND CHANGING PAD A complementary set of universal stroller straps perfectly matches the tan accent trimming and pairs beautifully with the thick navy and white stripe polyester (water resistant) exterior material. It also includes a cute matching portable changing mat. It truly feels more like a top designer fashion purse than a diaperbag! Dimensions 14.9 x 12.5 x 6 inches. Waterpoof polyester exterior.

HASSLE (NOT JUST HANDS) FREE! - We want you to be super comfortable and confident that this is the best diaper bag for you and your babies which is why we we provide a 90-day manufacturer warranty across all of our diaperbags. We also make it our mission to always put our customers first so if you have any issues whatsoever our amazing support team is on call to assist!
